price: (3) Indeed, We have made it an Arabic Qur’ān that you might understand.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَٰنًا عَرَبِيّٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnāhu qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan laʿallakum taʿqilūna
